method.name: FindFirstSet
method.summary: Find the first offset of set bit of the binary representation of the specified value. If the value is 0, this method will always return -1.

method.name: IsPowerOfTwo
method.summary: Indicates whether the specified value is the power of two.

method.name: CountSet
method.summary: Get the total number of set bits of the binary representation of a specified value.

method.name: GetNextSet
method.summary: Find a index of the binary representation of a value after the specified index, whose bit is set .

method.name: SetAt
method.summary: Get an value, indicating that the absolute position of all set bits with the specified set bit order.
method.param: The number of the order of set bits.

method.name: GetAllSets
method.summary: Find all offsets of set bits of the binary representation of a specified value.

summary.para: Reverse all bits in a specified value.
Note that the value is passed by reference though the method is an extension method, and returns nothing.

method.name: GetEnumerator

summary.para: Extension get enumerator of this type.
This method will allow you to use loop to iterate on all indices of set bits.
